message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but the quality of this product is worth a premium.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I understand the quality of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $105. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
